title: Prepare Your {{asset-model}} for Freezing Weather
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

With freezing temperatures forecast in {{post_town}}, please empty your water-butt or ensure it’s no more than half full. This helps prevent ice expansion which can crack your water-butt and cause leaks.

Thank you for helping to protect your equipment and reduce water waste.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heatwave Alert: Use Your Stored Rainwater Wisely
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

A severe heatwave is expected in {{post_town}} this week. To conserve water, please use water collected in your water-butt to water your garden in the evening or early morning to reduce evaporation.

Your efforts help manage local water resources during extreme heat.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heavy Rainfall Warning: Check Your {{asset-model}} Overflow
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

Heavy rain is forecast in {{post_town}} over the next few days. Please empty your water-butt to make space for the additional runoff, and ensure your water-butt overflow is clear and directed away from your home’s foundations to prevent flooding or water damage.

Stay safe and thank you for managing rainwater responsibly.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Freeze Warning: Drain Water-Butt
body: Freeze coming. Empty or half-fill your water-butt to stop ice damage. - Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heatwave: Use Rainwater
body: Severe heat ahead. Water your garden from your water-butt in the evening to save water. - Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heavy Rain: Check Overflow
body: Heavy rain coming. Clear your water-butt overflow to avoid flooding. - Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Strong Winds Forecast: Secure Your {{asset-model}}
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

High winds are forecast in {{post_town}}. Please check your water-butt is secure and the lid is tightly fitted to prevent damage or tipping over.

Stay safe.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: High Winds: Secure Water-Butt
body: High winds coming. Check your water-butt lid is tight and the barrel is stable. - Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Cold Snap: Protect Your {{asset-model}}
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

Freezing weather is expected in {{post_town}}. You may want to insulate or cover your plants to protect them from frost damage.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heavy Rain: Clear SuDS Drains
body: Heavy rain due soon. Please clear leaves and debris from your SuDS planter overflow to help manage runoff. - Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Heatwave: Water Your {{asset-model}}
body:
Dear {{contact_name}},

Hot weather is forecast in {{post_town}}. Water your SuDS planter plants in the evening to keep them healthy and absorbent during dry spells.

Best regards,
- Charlie, Our Rainwater

title: Windy Weather: Check SuDS Planter
body: Strong winds expected. Ensure your SuDS planter is free of loose items and plant stakes are secure. - Charlie, Our Rainwater
